item.description:
Great Herring Pond (Exit 2 off Rt. 3 South in Plymouth) Share of Gas, etc should be $20.00 Please email me your mobile number if I do not already have it. I will have some skis for those who do not have their own. And bring your own if have them for you or to share. Bring water or snacks if you want. Glen's mobile 617-799-1316

I will monitor the wind if it looks to be strong I might adjust the time just little to give everyone a better chance for better conditions...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be here or call my mobile.
item.name: Great Herring Pond - Plymouth, MA Sunday Morning
